parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Groups

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets [[formationDirection | formation direction]] of a group relative to current direction of the group leader. The group units will change their positions to form new formation if new formation direction is different (approx +/- 15 degrees). Does the same as:<br>
<code>_grp [[setFormDir]] [[getDir]] [[leader]] _grp;</code>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''resetSubgroupDirection''' unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] - any member of the [[Group]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[resetSubgroupDirection]] myUnit;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setFormDir]], [[group]], [[leader]], [[formation]], [[formationLeader]], [[formationMembers]], [[formationTask]], [[formationDirection]], [[formationPosition]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>New Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
